TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XamlDeferLoadAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that a class or property has a deferred load usage for XAML (such as a template behavior), and reports the class that enables the deferring behavior and its destination/content type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Xaml.XamlDeferringLoader> is possibly involved in defer load scenarios as a support class.
## WPF Usage Notes An example class where this attribute is applied in the WPF XAML implementation is <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContent>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string loaderType, string contentType) cil managed

Docs.param: The string name of the type for the implementation to use for the defer load behavior.
The string name of the type for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using string names of types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type loaderType, class System.Type contentType) cil managed

Docs.param: The CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the implementation to use for the defer load behavior.
The CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using CLR <xref:System.Type> values.
Gets the CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
Docs.value: The CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
Docs.returns: The CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.

Docs.summary: Gets the string name of the type for the implementation to use for the defer load behavior.
Docs.value: The string name of the type for the converter to use for the defer load behavior.
Docs.returns: The string name of the type for the converter to use for the defer load behavior.

Docs.summary: Gets the CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the implementation to use for the defer load behavior.
Docs.value: The CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the implementation to use for the defer load behavior.
Docs.returns: The CLR <xref:System.Type> value for the implementation to use for the defer load behavior.

Docs.summary: Gets the string name of the type for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
Docs.value: The string name of the type for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
Docs.returns: The string name of the type for the destination/content type of the defer load behavior.
